column2: "You were awesome back there! The Volcanic Caverns sure have their share of Darkers, too. That was crazy!"
"The Dragonkin claim they can defeat the Darkers on their own, but I wonder if that's true."

"I don't know how to put it, exactly...
It's like, the Dragonkin are defeating them, but they're not really going away."
"But I guess there's no point in worrying about that. I mean, we're just doing the best we can."
"Well, see ya, partner. I hope you'll be around the next time I need you!"
